text: Roland Mack 2009 Roland Mack (born 12 October 1949) is a German entrepreneur. Mack grew up as a son of the entrepreneur Franz Mack, in Waldkirch. In 1975, he became the founder of Europa-Park in Germany. == Personal life == Mack was born in Freiburg. He married Marianne Mack in 1974, and has two sons and a daughter. He is father of Michael Mack. He was appointed King of Fun by the IAAPA in November 2011 ==References== * * Category:20th-century German businesspeople Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Officers Crosses of the Order of Merit of the Federal Republic of Germany Category:Knights of the National Order of Merit (France) Category:21st-century German businesspeople Category:People from Freiburg im Breisgau
title: Roland Mack
